com.linecorp.armeria.server

Class AbstractPathMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractPathMapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PathMapping, Function<String,String>

    public abstract class AbstractPathMapping
extends Object
implements PathMapping
    A skeletal PathMapping implementation. Implement doApply(String).

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public final String apply(String path)
        Matches the specified path and translates the matched path to another path string. This method performs sanity checks on the specified path, calls doApply(String), and then performs sanity checks on the returned mappedPath.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface PathMapping
        Specified by:
        apply in interface Function<String,String>
        Parameters:
        path - an absolute path as defined in RFC3986
        Returns:
        the translated path which is used as the value of ServiceRequestContext.mappedPath(). null if the specified path does not match this mapping.

      • doApply

        protected abstract String doApply(String path)
        Invoked by apply(String) to perform the actual path matching and translation.
        Parameters:
        path - an absolute path as defined in RFC3986
        Returns:
        the translated path which is used as the value of ServiceRequestContext.mappedPath(). null if the specified path does not match this mapping.
